scripts.deploy:s3:assets: aws s3 sync dist s3://$S3_BUCKET$S3_PREFIX --delete --exclude index.html --only-show-errors --cache-control public,max-age=31536000,immutable
scripts.deploy:s3:index: aws s3 cp dist/index.html s3://$S3_BUCKET$S3_PREFIX/index.html --only-show-errors --content-type text/html --cache-control no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --metadata-directive REPLACE
scripts.deploy:s3: npm run deploy:s3:assets && npm run deploy:s3:index
